name: basic-conversation
description: Multi-turn conversation skills, greetings, casual interactions, and conversation flow

conversation_patterns.description: Initial greeting leading to getting-to-know-you conversation

turns.user: Hello, how are you today?
What do you like to do for fun?
Hi there! Nice to meet you.
Tell me something interesting about yourself.
Good morning! How's your day going so far?
What makes you happy?

conversation_patterns.description: Starting with casual chat, building to more meaningful conversation

turns.user: It's such a beautiful day outside!
That's really interesting! Can you tell me more?
I'm having trouble deciding what to have for lunch.
I love that too! What got you into it?
Do you have any recommendations for good movies?
Oh wow, I've never tried that before. What's it like?

conversation_patterns.description: User sharing feelings, AI providing appropriate support

turns.user: I'm feeling pretty tired today.
That makes sense. How does that make you feel?
The weekend can't come soon enough!
That sounds fun. How long have you been doing that?

conversation_patterns.description: Quick single exchanges for testing individual responses

turns.user: Hey, what's up?
Hello! I'm {{user_name}}, nice to meet you.
What's your favorite type of music?
How do you usually spend your weekends?

global_assertions.value: Response should be suitable for voice conversation - natural, conversational, and easy to speak aloud
